metadata.name: Miss Charm Lottery Ticket | Tier 4
metadata.description: Miss Charm is lauded as the first beauty contest in the world that applies Blockchain technology in various aspects to add values and transparency to the whole otherwise antiquated process. One of the crucial applications is Non-fungible Token (NFT). As Miss Charm's first NFT series, Lottery Box is designed to educate our audience about Blockchain, crypto wallet handling, and NFT transactions. Especially, Lottery Box is the lucky ticket that grants you a chance to win huge prizes.
